affixes.template: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to #% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Deflecting
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (8-11)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Bending
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (12-14)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Curvation
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (15-17)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Diversion
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (18-20)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Flexure
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (21-23)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]

tiers.name: of Warping
tiers.text: Gain [Deflect|Deflection Rating] equal to (24-26)% of [Evasion|Evasion Rating]
